name: Jail Cell Puzzle (One Hour Game Jam 73)
name_original: Jail Cell Puzzle (One Hour Game Jam 73)
description:
Trapped in a jail cell, you must use your intelligence, but mostly your memory, to escape.

This is a small puzzle game made in a hour using Stencyl, for the 73rd One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'isolation'.

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move your character.
  • Work out how to escape your jail cells.
